Bob Beal Memorial Race Weekend

Congratulations to Nate Sievers for a second place finish and to Johnathan Doller for a fourth place finish at the Bob Beal Memorial Criterium this past weekend. Congratulations to Alan Potter for a victory in the Men's Non-aero category of the New England Time Trial  Championships!

Bob Beal Memorial Criterium (Aug 17 2014)
Johnathan Doller Men 4 /5 35+ 4/29
Chad Guervremont Men 4/5  35+ 16/29
William Paredes Men 4/5  35+ 19/29
Nate Sievers Men 4/5 Open 2/20
Brian Albert Men 4/5 Open 7/20

 

2014 New England Time Trial Championships (Aug 16 2014)
Alan Potter Men NON-Aero OPEN 1-10
Johnathan Doller Men NON-Aero OPEN 6-10
Doug Shepard Men NON-Aero OPEN 8-10
Bob Scherner Men Master 65-69 0/9
Stephen Allison Men Master 65-69 5/9
